original_text: Jesus saw that crowds of people were following him. So he went up a hill and he sat down there to teach them. His disciples came near to listen to him.
korean_text: 예수께서 무리를 보시고 산에 올라가 앉으시니 제자들이 나아온지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus saw that crowds of people were following him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 무리들이 자기를 따르고 있는 것을 보셨다

sentences.original_text: So he went up a hill
and he sat down there to teach them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들을 가르치기 위해 그곳에 앉으셨다
